project.name: C-C834A-WIRE-04-ST04-DT03-DF15-CF18-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C834A-WIRE-04-ST04-DT03-DF15-CF18-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Takes an integer as input, and determine if the integer is prime using the truly stupid method of seeing if every natural number less than it will divide into it. If the integer is a large prime number, the program will loop excessively.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 2105 -s 12 -m "68718952445" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C834A-WIRE-04-ST04-DT03-DF15-CF18-01-BAD-01
iopair.description:
Takes an integer as input, and determine if the integer is prime using the truly stupid method of seeing if every natural number less than it will divide into it. If the integer is a large prime number, the program will loop excessively.
This input causes the program to excessively loop, slowing it down. However, the exploit will still result in successful execution. There is currently nothing better to check for long execution. Thus, we simply check the original good output to ensure it ran fully.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 2105 -s 12 -m "1073676287" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-07 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
